title: Example County MEHKO
description: Example County MEHKO permit application with improved formatting and clearer step references.

steps.title: Plan Your MEHKO
steps.content:
**What to do:** Review the MEHKO program overview and understand the requirements.

**Why it matters:** Understanding the program helps you prepare properly and avoid delays.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Basic understanding of MEHKO rules
- ☐ Kitchen setup assessment
- ☐ Menu planning ideas

**Where/how:** Review county MEHKO overview; visit the county website for current information.

**Cost & time:** $0 · 15–30 minutes

**Ready when:** You understand the basic requirements and have a plan for your operation.

steps.title: Approvals & Training
steps.content:
**What to do:** Get required approvals and complete food safety training.

**Why it matters:** These are mandatory requirements that must be completed before applying.

**What you need:**
- ☐ CFPM certificate (ANSI-CFP recognized)
- ☐ Landlord/HOA approval (if renting)
- ☐ City business license (if required)

**Where/how:** Take an ANSI-approved CFPM course; check local business license requirements.

**Cost & time:** $150–300 for CFPM · 2–4 weeks

**Ready when:** You have your CFPM certificate and all required approvals.

steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.content:
**What to do:** Gather the documents you'll submit with your application.

**Why it matters:** Incomplete submissions delay approval and inspection.

**What you need:**
- ☐ SOP form — go to Step 4: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
- ☐ Health Permit Application — go to Step 5: Health Permit Application
- ☐ CFPM certificate (from Step 2: Approvals & Training)
- ☐ Government ID and basic business info

**Where/how:** Organize files (PDFs/photos) for upload or printing.

**Cost & time:** $0 · 30–60 minutes

**Ready when:** All documents are filled/signed and stored as PDFs.
searchTerms: Example County Home Kitchen Operations forms

steps.title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
steps.content:
**What to do:** Fill the MEHKO SOP form covering menu, preparation, storage, and sanitation.

**Why it matters:** This shows the county how you will keep food safe at home.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Menu and ingredients list
- ☐ Prep/cooking/cooling/holding details
- ☐ Cleaning/sanitizing plan; handwashing setup

**Where/how:** Complete the SOP form in this step.

**Cost & time:** $0 · 30–60 minutes

**Ready when:** SOP is complete and consistent with your operation.
searchTerms: Example County food safety SOP requirements
MEHKO Standard Operating Procedures Example County

steps.title: Health Permit Application
steps.content:
**What to do:** Complete the county Health Permit Application for a Microenterprise Home Kitchen Operation.

**Why it matters:** This is the official request to operate a MEHKO.

**What you need:**
- ☐ Owner contact and site address
- ☐ CFPM certificate details
- ☐ SOP — go to Step 4: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)

**Where/how:** Complete the application in this step.

**Cost & time:** $0 to fill · 15–30 minutes

**Ready when:** Application is complete and matches your SOP.
